definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to weep disconsolately/to cry on each other's shoulder
to treat the symptoms/reactive (rather than proactive)
to deliver a frontal assault/to meet head-on (idiom)

pinyin: tou2 tong4 yi1 tou2 , jiao3 tong4 yi1 jiao3

sentences.english: Frontline turnover is one of the biggest headaches for call center managers.
sentences.chinese: 对治理者来说，一线坐席辞职是最为头痛的标题。

sentences.english: The fresh air and exercise cured him of his headache.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸新鲜空气和坚持锻炼把他的头痛病治好了。

sentences.english: Teaching child is making youngs headache.
sentences.chinese: 教育小孩对年轻人来说很头痛。

sentences.english: She took an aspirin to relieve her headache.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了一片阿斯匹林以解头痛。

sentences.english: Migraines are one of the few neurological disorders to subside with age.
sentences.chinese: 偏头痛是随着年龄发作率递减的神经系统疾病之一。

sentences.english: The clamour of the heavy traffic gave you a headache.
sentences.chinese: 来往车辆嘈杂的声浪使人头痛。

sentences.english: Herzog and Simons are optimistic about the prospects for making progress against migraines.
sentences.chinese: 荷佐和赛门斯对于治疗偏头痛的未来进展颇为乐观。

sentences.english: For migraine sufferers, summer can be a perilous time of year.
sentences.chinese: 对偏头痛患者来说，夏季是一年中的危险时段。

sentences.english: What is headachy optimal treatment method?
sentences.chinese: 头痛的最佳治疗方法是什么？

sentences.english: The corruption of administrative power is a headachy problem, which plagues most countries and their people.
sentences.chinese: 行政权力腐败是一个令各国政府和人民头痛的问题。

sentences.english: The left Zheng really has a headache.
Stop headachy Chinese traditional medicine recipe?
sentences.chinese: 有没有止头痛的中药配方？

sentences.english: It’ll flush your system and reduce headaches and constipation.
sentences.chinese: 这样会振奋你的身体系统并减少头痛和便秘。

sentences.english: Why can you appear headachy phenomenon?
sentences.chinese: 为什么会出现头痛的现象？

sentences.english: As a result, childhood migraines are often dismissed as sinus headaches.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小孩的偏头痛往往被诊断为鼻窦炎疼痛。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the clinical effect of Shuluotong capsules on blood-stasis migraine.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察舒络通胶囊治疗血瘀型偏头痛的临床疗效。
